scenes.description: Koseki Bijou (Biboo) talking to the audience on stage, announcing her next song.
Performance of the song 'This Game' by Konomi Suzuki.

subtitles.original: Okay, I got it then.
subtitles.english: Okay, I got it then.

subtitles.original: I'm gonna sing and dance a song right now!
subtitles.english: I'm gonna sing and dance a song right now!

subtitles.original: Here we go!
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: This Game!
subtitles.english: This Game!

subtitles.original: 回り続ける 歯車には成り下がらない
subtitles.english: I will never degenerate into a continuously turning gear.

subtitles.original: 平均演じる 誕生から始まった地獄
subtitles.english: Playing the average, a hell that started from birth.

subtitles.original: 遊び半分で 神が導いた 盤上の世界
subtitles.english: The board world that God led with half-playfulness.

subtitles.original: No no no game no life
subtitles.english: No no no game no life

subtitles.original: ぬるい平穏を ばっさり切り捨てて
subtitles.english: Cut away the lukewarm peace entirely,

subtitles.original: 栄光の階段に 存在刻むんだ
subtitles.english: And carve your existence into the stairs of glory.

subtitles.original: 目に映るのは 完全勝利の運命
subtitles.english: What is reflected in my eyes is the fate of complete victory.

subtitles.original: 何もかも 計算通り
subtitles.english: Everything is according to plan.

subtitles.original: 変えてやる 染まらない空白で
subtitles.english: I'll change it with an undyed blank.

subtitles.original: We are Maverick 救済なんていらない
subtitles.english: We are Maverick, we don't need salvation.

subtitles.original: どんな理不尽 襲おうとも
subtitles.english: No matter what unreasonableness attacks,

subtitles.original: 勝てばいいだけの 話だろう
subtitles.english: It's just a matter of winning, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 駆け引きと 才能が 無敗誘う
subtitles.english: Strategy and talent invite invincibility.

subtitles.original: 生まれ直した命で 楽しむさ
subtitles.english: I'll enjoy it with this reborn life.

subtitles.original: 自分だけは自分 信じてる
subtitles.english: Only I believe in myself.

subtitles.original: 心に潜む 闇より強い相手はいない
subtitles.english: There is no opponent stronger than the darkness lurking in the heart.

subtitles.original: 挫ける限り そこに敗北はありえない
subtitles.english: As long as you don't give up, there is no defeat.

subtitles.original: 上辺の個性で 安心と引き換えに
subtitles.english: Don't exchange your peace of mind for superficial individuality...

subtitles.original: プライド殺すな
subtitles.english: ...and kill your pride.

subtitles.original: No no no sense of life
subtitles.english: No no no sense of life

subtitles.original: 野蛮な雑音を キッパリ蹴飛ばして
subtitles.english: Kick away the savage noise decisively,

subtitles.original: 誰より純粋な 声上げるんだ
subtitles.english: And raise a voice purer than anyone else's.

subtitles.original: 戦うことは きっと間違いじゃない
subtitles.english: Fighting is definitely not a mistake.

subtitles.original: 手応えが 教えてくれた
subtitles.english: The response taught me that.

subtitles.original: 全て失っても 勝ち残れ
subtitles.english: Even if you lose everything, survive and win.

subtitles.original: We are Maverick 常識なんていらない
subtitles.english: We are Maverick, we don't need common sense.

subtitles.original: 前へならえ 向かう先に
subtitles.english: Align to the front; ahead of where we're heading...

subtitles.original: 待ってるのは退屈だろう
subtitles.english: ...only boredom is waiting.

subtitles.original: 言いなりじゃ つまらない
subtitles.english: It's boring to just do as you're told.

subtitles.original: 挑んでやる
subtitles.english: I'll challenge it.

subtitles.original: 生まれ直した命も 駒にして
subtitles.english: Using even this reborn life as a game piece,

subtitles.original: 自分だけの道を 最後まで
subtitles.english: I'll follow my own path to the very end.

subtitles.original: 迷わない 選ばれし者
subtitles.english: I won't hesitate, as the chosen one.

subtitles.original: 真っ赤な自惚れでも
subtitles.english: Even if it's sheer conceit,

subtitles.original: 誇らしく 生き抜くための
subtitles.english: Because I only know one way...

subtitles.original: 方法を一つしか 知らないから
subtitles.english: ...to survive proudly.

subtitles.original: We are Maverick 救済なんていらない
subtitles.english: We are Maverick, we don't need salvation.

subtitles.original: どんな理不尽 襲おうとも
subtitles.english: No matter what unreasonableness attacks,

subtitles.original: 勝てばいいだけの 話だろう
subtitles.english: It's just a matter of winning, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 駆け引きと 才能が 無敗誘う
subtitles.english: Strategy and talent invite invincibility.

subtitles.original: 生まれ直した命で 楽しむさ
subtitles.english: I'll enjoy it with this reborn life.

subtitles.original: この世界 手にして 笑うんだ
subtitles.english: I'll take this world in my hands and laugh.

subtitles.original: We are Maverick 最強の Maverick Gamers
subtitles.english: We are Maverick, the strongest Maverick Gamers.

subtitles.original: 空白ならば 何者にもなれる
subtitles.english: If it is blank, I can become anything.

subtitles.original: 自分だけは自分
subtitles.english: Only I...

subtitles.original: 信じてる
subtitles.english: ...believe in myself.
